query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `iot_3d_floor_plans` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `building_name` varchar(100),
  `floor_number` int DEFAULT 1,
  `model_url` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `model_format` enum('gltf','glb','obj','fbx') DEFAULT 'glb',
  `model_scale` decimal(10,4) DEFAULT 1.0000,
  `thumbnail_url` varchar(500),
  `camera_position` json,
  `camera_target` json,
  `lighting_config` json,
  `environment_map` varchar(500),
  `floor_dimensions` json,
  `grid_enabled` tinyint DEFAULT 1,
  `grid_size` int DEFAULT 10,
  `status` enum('draft','active','archived') DEFAULT 'draft',
  `created_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `idx_3d_floor_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_3d_floor_building` (`building_name`)
);

  `camera_position` json,
  `camera_target` json,
  `lighting_config` json,
  `environment_map` varchar(500),
  `floor_dimensions` json,
  `grid_enabled` tinyint DEFAULT 1,

  `status` enum('draft','active','archived') DEFAULT 'draft',
  `created_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `idx_3d_floor_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_3d_floor_building` (`building_name`)
);
